1.0.name: wordpress/advanced-fancybox
1.0.description:
Fancybox (lightbox) fully compatible for wordpress. You can add (so far):

  • Image link (local or external)
  • Html content (or normal - Content hast to be added using a custom field with normal text or html content)
  • Link to another webpage (webpage content will show in iframe)

Requires JavaScript Enabled. Uses jQuery (Fancybox and TinyMce Editor).<br/> You can modify all settings fancybox code allows you to modify!

How to use custom fields? <br/><br/> DONATE! <br/>DONATE HERE - (any ammount using paypal or credit card) <br/>
